title: Art show with something old, something new
text: Art show with something old, something new Sunday, 18 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) An upstate New York exhibition of contemporary art showcases the work of modern-day artists while also paying homage to a pair of titans of the 19th century Hudson River School, Thomas Cole and Frederic Church Stephen Colbert Hosts Jimmy Kimmel 00:44 Stephen Colbert's couch has been a hangout for late-night hosts recently as, after singing a duet with Late Late Show host James Corden, The Late Show welcomed Colbert's 11:30 p.m. competitor Jimmy Kimmel to the program Friday.
